snippet: On Monday, Univision, the dominant Spanish-language network in the United States, will unveil UniMás, a new name and look for its second-largest network, TeleFutura.
abstract: Univision, dominant Spanish-language network in the United States, will rename its second-largest network, TeleFutura, as UniMas; move is direct shot at competitor Telemundo, and comes amid spate of rebranding in Spanish-language TV.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Univision, the dominant Spanish-language network in the United States, will unveil UniMás, a new name and look for its second-largest network, TeleFutura.

headline.seo: A Spate of Rebranding for Spanish-Language Television
headline.main: A Spate of Rebranding for Spanish-Language TV
headline.print_headline: A Spate of Rebranding for Spanish-Language TV
